item.description:
You are cordially invited to join us for an evening of elegance (Black Tie Optional) as
we celebrate our 27th Anniversary and crown Miss Tall Boston 2010.

Schedule
Cocktails: 5:00 PM
Dinner: 6:00 PM
Pageant: 7:30 PM
Dance: 9:00 PM
Sunday Brunch: 10:00 AM

Meal Choice: Chicken or Fish

Prices:
Dinner/Pageant/Dance/Brunch - $80 (past deadline for package)
Pageant/Dance/Brunch - $30 Walk-ins accepted with cash payment
Dance Only - $15 Walk-ins accepted with cash payment

To see the full flier for the event, see the Boston Beanstalks website. Event Flier

Overnight accommodations are available with the Crowne Plaza for $89. Call the hotel directly to make a reservation at 617-969-3010.

Payment via PayPal/credit card via the link available when you RSVP. Please forward a copy of your PayPal confirmation to registrar@hubtall.org and include your dinner selection if you're coming to dinner.

** NOTE on PARTIALS **
I'm sorry but Meetup cannot deal with multiple prices for the same event. If you would like to sign-up for the dance only, please RSVP here but pay on the Beanstalks website; BBTC Payments
item.name: 27th BBTC Anniversary Dinner, Dance and Miss Tall Boston Pageant
